item.title: Attention-Informed Surrogates for Navigating Power-Performance Trade-offs in HPC
item.description: arXiv:2601.15399v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: High-Performance Computing (HPC) schedulers must balance user performance with facility-wide resource constraints. The task boils down to selecting the optimal number of nodes for a given job.
